    • Method Detail

      • getCurrent

        public State<T> getCurrent(T stateful)
        Description copied from interface: Persister
        Returns the current state. This will not call into the underlying database
        Specified by:
        getCurrent in interface Persister<T>
        Parameters:
        stateful - Stateful Entity
        Returns:
        current State of the Stateful Entity

      • setCurrent

        public abstract void setCurrent(T stateful,
                                State<T> current,
                                State<T> next)
                         throws StaleStateException
        Set the current State. This method will ensure that the state in the db matches the expected current state. If not, it will throw a StateStateException
        Specified by:
        setCurrent in interface Persister<T>
        Parameters:
        stateful - Stateful Entity
        current - Expected current State
        next - The value of the next State
        Throws:
        StaleStateException - thrown if the value of the State does not equal to the provided current State
